description: Keeping up with the trends is a job on its own. Fortunately there are a few services to help you find the right fit. 👕💍👠

description: The "bookstore" that sells T.P. and anything you're looking for.

description: Did you know you can schedule your Instagram posts, turn your best photos into edible marshmallows, and get detailed analytics for all your pics? There are apps for that. 📷

description: Plain text can be so boring. Find a new way to spice up your communication.

description: What are they doing? What are they wearing? Who are they dating? What are they investing in?

name: politics

description: Stay in the know. Keep up to date. See what's going on in the world.

description: Still using the default alarm on your phone? Try something new, but warning: not all of them come with a snooze button. 😴

description: Managing your time is hard without a plan. Make a list, check it twice, see which tasks are easy and nice. ✔︎

description: Quit procastinating and just do it already. Seriously, do it.

description: If time is most precious, this collection of lifehacks is so so precious. Be more productive and optimize your life.

description: Be more expressive with your communication. 😁😮😜

description: Design is more than just pretty pixels (no offense, pretty pixels). It's about user experience (UX), graphic design, and so much more, often aided by tools like Photoshop, Sketch, Illustrator, and other useful tools. 🎨

description: Losing weight? Gaining weight? There are so many resources available, from calorie counting apps to personal coaches in your pocket. 💪

description: Need to hire someone? Want a job? You've come to the right place.

description: Love it or hate it, electronic mail is a huge part of your life but fortunately there are so many apps and extensions to make it more managable. PSA: Please don't "Reply All" to everything. 😁

description: If you love talk radio, you'll love podcasts. There's a show on every topic imaginable, so download your favorite podcast player (Overcast and Stitcher are great options) and enjoy at the gym or in the car. 🎧

description: Gather your friends and play some games around a table (or floor... tabletop games also work on that platform).

name: board-games
description: Before computers and iPads, there were board games. They came in boxes and and you got friends together and played with them and it was awesome.

description: Level up your Chrome with super browser extensions. Happy surfing. 🏄

description: Facebook's Oculus is looking to revolutionize the way we consume media and communicate with the world, through virtual reality (VR).

name: drones
description: It’s a bird! It’s a plane! Nope, it's a drone. Unmanned aerial vehicles are growing in popularity, from the DGI Phantom to the autonomous Lily drone. Even Amazon may deliver T.P. from the sky soon.

name: virtual-reality
description: Strap on an Oculus or HTC Vive, and transport to a virtual world. Virtual Reality (VR) is one of the most transformational technologies to change the way we game, travel, and “call” home.

name: telegram
description: The free, multiplatform messaging app used by over 100 million people every month is home for bots for every use case. Here are some of the best integrations.

name: uber
description: Get from A to B, the smartest way. Your private driver, on-demand.

name: gear-vr
description: Slip into the world of virtual reality whenever you want to the Samsung Gear VR.

name: apple-tv
description: After a long day at the office, find solitude in the vast world of TV and film on your Apple TV. Couch not included. 📺

description: Steam's take on virtual reality (VR), focused on mobility and great gaming.

name: playstation-vr
description: The Sony PlayStation aims to bring virtual reality (VR) to anyone with a PS4. No costly PC needed.

name: slack
description: Real-time chat with everyone. Use it with your team, family, and friends.

name: web
description: You know that place with all those cat pics and GIFs? It also has some other neat stuff.

name: mac
description: The legendary foundations of Apple Computers. They're easy to use and easy to love. Go ahead, hop on the 🍎 bandwagon.

name: windows
description: The Personal Computer changed the way we live and work, created by the legendary Bill Gates with the vision to put a "computer on every desk".

name: kindle
description: Collect and read books that won't gather dust on the handy, portable Amazon Kindle.

name: linux
description: For those who love to customize their OS to their own likings. Fedora, Red Hat, Ubuntu. You'll have your pick.

name: apple-watch
description: When you don't have enough notifications on your Phone to distract you, get them on your wrist. Apple's sexy wearable might change your life.

description: Did you know that card games used to be played IRL with laminated paper instead of on an iPad? Crazy, right?!

name: ipad
description: A slab of Apple computing genius, now in multiple tablet sizes: Mini, Air, and Pro.

name: iphone
description: The beloved "phone" that changed the way we communicate, play games, and snap photos. 📱

name: wii-u
description: Relive your childhood with Mario, Zelda, and Pokemon on Nintendo's motion-sensing console.

name: 3ds
description: The king of handheld gaming is still on top. Play the classics, from Mario to Pokemon, reimagined in 3D without the need for dorky glasses.

name: vita
description: Sony's second handheld brings console quality games straight to your fingertips. Play Vita exclusives or even stream games directly from your PS4.

name: xbox-one
description: Microsoft's console brings you awesome games like Halo and Gears of War and doubles as a killer home media device.

name: android
description: One of the fastest growing platforms of all time, the little green bot lives in your pocket and does just about anything.
